oai_dc:dc.dc:title: EFFECTS OF POSSIBLE DELTA-B = - DELTA-Q TRANSITIONS IN NEUTRAL B-MESON DECAYS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DASS, GV
SARMA, KVL
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cp-violation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We explore the possibility that the existing data on like-sign dileptons at the UPSILON(4S) resonance consist of events arising from B(d)0-B(d)0BAR mixing and also from DELTAB = DELTAQ transitions. We study the consequences of these nonstandard transitions for certain time asymmetries which are likely to be measured at the B factories.
